title: Function description on Connector 365 Online Help
description: Recent content in Function description on Connector 365 Online Help

items.title: Data to be evaluated
items.content_html:
Data to be evaluated

After the setup of the supplier evaluation(s) is completed, this
chapter describes how and at which points in Dynamics 365 Business Central the data is
that will later be evaluated based on the ratings that have been set up. During the
Collection of “soft” and “hard” factors, different factors are used.

items.title: Evaluation
items.content_html:
Evaluation

All available evaluations can be found via the menu item “Supplier evaluation” - “Reports”.

items.title: Setup Wizard
items.content_html:
Setup Wizard

The setup wizard is used to create new and edit existing supplier evaluations. It is opened via the menu item “Easy Supra setup wizard”. Users are guided through the setup process in five steps with the help of the wizard. These five steps are described in more detail in the following sections in the form of an activity guide.

items.title: Import / Export
items.content_html:
Import / Export

Under “Explore All” - “Administration” - “Supplier Rating” - “Setup” - “Import/Export Setup Data”, data can be exported or imported as .txt files. This allows the setup of the ratings to be used across clients or databases.
